body:
master @ 65c05db660b2ca1d0076b0d8573a6760b3228068.
Running `time FILE_ENV="./ci/test/00_setup_env_native_fuzz.sh" ./ci/test_run_all.sh` on Rawhide aarch64.

```bash

0x52d000000406: note: pointer points here
```
